Birds and Caterpillars Introduction

Bacteria

<b>Recovered/Vaccinated:</b> Individuals in this state either had the disease and then recovered from it or have been vaccinated to prevent the disease. In the simulation, these individuals cannot get the disease.
nn-NO: <b>Blitt frisk/vaksinert:</b> Personar i denne tilstanden har anten  hatt  sjukdomen og blitt friske igjen, eller blitt vaksinerte mot sjukdomen. I denne simuleringa kan desse personane ikkje få sjukdomen.
